summary:
- **Buy-back type**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total securities bought back as of 17/6/2025**: 1,480,068 (1,472,068 before + 8,000 on previous day)  
- **Maximum buy-back target**: 15,055,408 CAM shares (10% of issued capital)  
- **Remaining buy-back capacity**: 13,575,340 shares  
- **Price range paid**: AUD 0.715–0.755 per share  
- **Broker executing buy-back**: Sanlam Private Wealth Pty Limited  
- **Buy-back window**: 10/3/2025 to 9/3/2026
